title: Racist name
body: so i may have a smurf with a extremely racist name. Could playing on this account get my main banned or would it only affect the racist account?

replies.body: I'm not part of the PB team so I couldn't say for sure, but you're better off being safe by just reaching out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead of waiting to get reported.  We'll be able to change your name from there!

While Riot reserves the right to terminate any account for any reason, it would not be common for one account to be punished for the actions of another account, even if owned by the same player.

That said, you are clearly aware that what you are doing is not okay, or you wouldn't be here asking about it. I would instead reflect on why you want to have an account with an offensive name, and instead of waiting for it to be reported, just purchase a name request yourself, or [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot directly about this.
so could i ask riot to change it for me?

Your best option would be to [Submit a Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this. Riot does change inappropriate names, but generally the player does not have input on what the name is changed to when this happens.
